actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill for the relief of Goldhorn Cheng, Cheng-Hwa Lee Cheng, Shih-Chuang Cheng, Shih-Huang Cheng, and Shih-Kang Cheng.

summary.text: Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act. Authorizes the granting of visas and admission to the United States for permanent residence to four named individuals.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Goldhorn Cheng, Cheng-Hwa Lee Cheng, Shih-Chuang Cheng, Shih-Huang Cheng, and Shih-Kang Cheng.
